title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 41/94 of 11 January 1994 amending Annex II to Council Regulation (EEC) No 2455/92 concerning the export and import of certain dangerous chemicals
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 41/94 of 11 January 1994 amending Annex II to Council Regulation (EEC) No 2455/92 concerning the export and import of certain dangerous chemicals
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The entries set out in the Annex to this Regulation are included for the first time in Annex II to Regulation (EEC) No 2455/92.

This Regulation shall come into force one month after its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 January 1994.
For the Commission
Yannis PALEOKRASSAS
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 251, 29. 8. 1992, p. 13.
(2) OJ No L 196, 16. 8. 1967, p. 1.
ANNEX
Chemicals subject to PIC and the import decisions of third countries
